alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 21 at 2:40PM MDT until October 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SATURDAY TO 6 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches at lower elevations, and up to 8 inches in the Bears Paw Mountains. * WHERE...Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine. * WHEN...From 6 PM Saturday to 6 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock, please visit our webpage and select Local Programs, then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine
